name: A Black Night In Purgatory
description:
WASD/Directional pad to move

Click to shoot 

The less health you have the more; damage, speed, and vision you get. 

When demons hit you, gain mana at the cost of health.

Pick up lost souls to absorb a small amount of health and mana.

no sound effects because I don't know how to make them and don't have the time left to learn.

Have fun with my second Itch Game!

Follow me on instagram @Game_Dev_Boi to see my future games!
